about_the_game:
【Overview】
"Sword Smash 2" is an exhilarating top-down 2D action game that introduces new elements from its predecessor, Sword Smash.

Take control of the player character and aim to defeat numerous monsters and bosses. Diverse monsters inhabit each stage, and clearing all stages requires defeating the respective bosses.

In this installment, passive skills have been added, weapons can be exchanged, and various gimmick stages have been introduced, making the game even more user-friendly than its predecessor.

【Features】

【New】
You can change weapons.
Equip new weapons to mow down hordes of enemies.
You can equip passive skills.
Equipping various passive skills such as attack, defense, and support can give the player an advantage.

Normal attacks with left-click. You can't attack continuously; attacks are limited by "Stamina."

Accumulate "Mana" to unleash powerful active skills. Activate these skills to swiftly defeat enemies!

Defeating enemies yields experience points. Strengthen the player through level-up bonuses.

Numerous monsters appear, and defeating a specific number triggers the appearance of a boss. Touch the clear portal that appears after defeating the boss to clear the stage and proceed to the next one.

【Controls】

Right-click: Dash
Left-click: Normal Attack
Movement: WASD keys
Mouse Cursor: Choose level-up bonuses, select active skills
